Name: Nazi Zombies Portable
Description: Nazi Zombies Portable (NZP) dedicated server template for AMP
Author: AMP Community
Notes: Requires NZP-specific FTEQW binary (nzportable/nzportable64), pc-nzp-assets.zip, and QuakeC files (fte-nzp-qc.zip, standard-nzp-qc.zip). Extract assets alongside the binary and QuakeC files into the nzp directory.
